sense.gloss: to get (very) cold, to get (much) colder
to feel very cold (of the body), to be chilled to the bone
to worsen (of relations, economic conditions, etc.), to decline

sdata.j: ↑明↑↓あ↓け↑方↑↓がた↓↑近↑↓ちか↓くは、ぐっと↑冷↑↓|ひ↓え↑込↑↓こ↓む|。
sdata.e: It gets extremely cold toward dawn.

sdata.j: もう↑冷↑↓|ひ↓え↑込↑↓こ↓む|こともなくなったし、そろそろスタッドレスからノーマルタイヤに↑戻↑↓もど↓した↑方↑↓ほう↓がいいぞ。
sdata.e: It has stopped getting colder already, so it is best to swap studded tyres to normal tyres.

sdata.j: この↑季↑↓き↓↑節↑↓せつ↓、↑日↑↓ひ↓が↑陰↑↓かげ↓ると↑一気↑↓いっき↓に↑冷↑↓|ひ↓え↑込↑↓こ↓む|ので、↑調整↑↓ちょうせい↓しやすい↑服装↑↓ふくそう↓でお↑越↑↓こ↓しください。
sdata.e: In this season, when the sun becomes obstructed it gets cold very quickly, so please come wearing clothes that are suitable for any kind of temperature.
